title: Psychology, Twitter and Tangents in between
description:
I had a lovely conversation with Psychologist Kirsty Miller.  We speak about her perspective on the current state of social psychology, and differing ideologies being taught in that field. We also speak about feminism, trans right, abortion and how to conduct yourself on twitter in a healthy manner

Follow Kirsty here:

twitter: @justcallmekirsty
website: https://kirsty-miller.com
